name: fluxx-backend
description: Exemple de backbone pour la réalisation de backend web
author: Jérémy DIERX

scripts.remoteSeedProd: pm2 deploy production exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && npm run seed'
scripts.remoteWebStartProd: pm2 deploy production exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 start web.js --time --name mon-plan-action.fr --max-memory-restart 300M -i max'
scripts.remoteWebStopProd: pm2 deploy production exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 stop mon-plan-action.fr'
scripts.remoteWebRestartProd: pm2 deploy production exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 restart mon-plan-action.fr'
scripts.remoteWebDeleteProd: pm2 deploy staging exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 delete mon-plan-action.fr'
scripts.remoteListProd: pm2 deploy production exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 list'
scripts.remoteSaveProd: pm2 deploy production exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 save'
scripts.remoteWorkerStartProd: pm2 deploy production exec './remoteWorker.sh prod start'
scripts.remoteWorkerStopProd: pm2 deploy production exec './remoteWorker.sh prod stop'
scripts.remoteWorkerRestartProd: pm2 deploy production exec './remoteWorker.sh prod restart'
scripts.remoteWorkerDeleteProd: pm2 deploy production exec './remoteWorker.sh prod delete'
scripts.remoteSeedStag: pm2 deploy staging exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && npm run seed'
scripts.remoteWebStartStag: pm2 deploy staging exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 start web.js --time --name stag.mon-plan-action.fr --max-memory-restart 300M'
scripts.remoteWebStopStag: pm2 deploy staging exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 stop stag.mon-plan-action.fr'
scripts.remoteWebRestartStag: pm2 deploy staging exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 restart stag.mon-plan-action.fr'
scripts.remoteWebDeleteStag: pm2 deploy staging exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 delete stag.mon-plan-action.fr'
scripts.remoteListStag: pm2 deploy staging exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 list'
scripts.remoteSaveStag: pm2 deploy staging exec '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && pm2 save'
scripts.remoteWorkerStartStag: pm2 deploy staging exec './remoteWorker.sh stag start'
scripts.remoteWorkerStopStag: pm2 deploy staging exec './remoteWorker.sh stag stop'
scripts.remoteWorkerRestartStag: pm2 deploy staging exec './remoteWorker.sh stag restart'
scripts.remoteWorkerDeleteStag: pm2 deploy staging exec './remoteWorker.sh stag delete'
